text:
Before Takht, Vicky Kaushal All Set To Star In A Horror Film Produced By Karan Johar
Before Takht, Vicky Kaushal All Set To Star In A Horror Film Produced By Karan Johar
Vicky Kaushal is basking in the glory of the success of Uri. After a phenomenal 2018, this year too is proving out to be an exciting one for the Uri actor.
His upcoming line up for projects includes KJo's period drama Takht that also stars Ranveer Singh, Kareena Kapoor Khan, Alia Bhatt, Bhumi Pednekar, Janhvi Kapoor, Anil Kapoor and Vicky Kaushal.
According to reports, Kaushal will step into the Aurangzeb's shoes for the period drama.
Instagram
While the movie will go on the floors in mid-2019, Vicky Kaushal has an existing horror film in his kitty.
Pinterest
Don't Miss 233 SHARES 870 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
The horror film will be again a Karan Johar production and Bhumi Pednekar has been roped in opposite him.
While the details of the project are yet to be out, this will be Kaushal's first stint with horror as a genre.
title: Before Takht, Vicky Kaushal All Set To Star In A Horror Film Produced By Karan Johar
